name: MommyDaddyTimePodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: We're Eric & Kristy Upton and every week after the kids go to bed we answer your questions about life, marriage, fitness, ministry, parenting and anything else you want to talk about. If you miss hanging out with friends who "get it" then you're not alone. We totally get it and we're here to help! Come over to our kitchen, grab a drink, and let's hang out! Shoot us your question by emailing us here --> ask@mommydaddytimepodcast.com or, you can also follow us on Instagram @MommyDaddyTimePodcast and DM us there. See you soon!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
